mapper.select: SELECT json_extract_path(ST_AsGeoJSON(ST_MakeLine(r.tramo))::json, 'coordinates') AS tramo, min(r.ts_inicio) AS ts_inicio, max(r.ts_fin) AS ts_fin FROM "RUTA" r WHERE cod_vuelo = #{codVuelo} GROUP BY cod_vuelo ORDER BY ts_inicio

SELECT v.cod_vuelo, v.peso, o.nombre AS origen, d.nombre AS destino, a.id AS a_id FROM "VUELO" v LEFT JOIN "AVION" a USING(cod_avion) LEFT JOIN "AEROPUERTO" o ON v.cod_origen = o.cod_aeropuerto LEFT JOIN "AEROPUERTO" d ON v.cod_destino = d.cod_aeropuerto WHERE v.cod_avion = #{cod_avion}

SELECT v.cod_vuelo, v.peso, o.nombre AS origen, d.nombre AS destino, a.id AS a_id FROM "VUELO" v LEFT JOIN "AVION" a USING(cod_avion) LEFT JOIN "AEROPUERTO" o ON v.cod_origen = o.cod_aeropuerto LEFT JOIN "AEROPUERTO" d ON v.cod_destino = d.cod_aeropuerto WHERE v.cod_vuelo = #{codVuelo}
